entry.title: Hello
entry.content:
Hello everyone, it has been a while!

We’ve been taking some time off on figuring out the best way to provide meaningful content. Instead of burdening ourselves with showing and updating each possible position we post, we’ll simply provide ideas and leave the rest of the details on position management up to the discretion of the reader.

As such, we’ll be deprecating our old trades and history page, though they will be left there for, well, history. They simply won’t be maintained or updated.

We’ll also be removing our limit with just options trading and expand into stocks and forex. Keep an eye out on these sections.
